nodes.text: The Theed Royal Library was a library located in the city of Theed, the capital of the peaceful planet Naboo. It was turned into a war room during the Trade Federation invasion in 32 BBY.

Constructed in the Naboo capital city, Theed, the Royal Library served the citizens of Naboo as a haven of learning. In 32 BBY, Naboo was invaded by the droid armies of the Trade Federation. The Royal Library was turned into a war room by the droids. Two Jedi Knights, Qui-Gon Jinn and Obi-Wan Kenobi passed by the library on their way to rescue the Queen of Naboo, Padmé Amidala from being taken to the prisoner camps. Through their efforts, the Queen was able to escape offworld and break the Federation's blockade.
The Theed Royal Library appears in the background of the 2000 video game Star Wars: Episode I Jedi Power Battles in the game's third mission.
